snippet: The wrong pair of shoes can cramp your feet, your style and your vacation. Here are some shoes flight attendants choose for comfort (and even fashion) on the go.
abstract: Stephanie Rosenbloom The Getaway column on the favorite shoe styles of flight attendants, who need to consider both comfort and style when choosing footwear.
lead_paragraph: The wrong pair of shoes can cramp your feet, your style and your vacation. Here are some shoes flight attendants choose for comfort (and even fashion) on the go.

headline.print_headline: Fleet of Foot, on Land or in the Air
headline.seo: Best Shoes for Travel? Ask a Flight Attendant
headline.main: Best Shoes for Travel? Ask a Flight Attendant
